column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I have been here a number of times.  Seen a few different shows.  This museum does have a large and varied collection that's on permanent display
column2: or at least displayed often and for long periods of time.  There is an African Art section
column3: with lots of sculpture; there is an Impressionist area
column4: followed up with a post-Impressionist area.   There is an "American Indian" area
column5: showcasing some of the remaining works from this group.  Georgia O'Keefe donated the Alfred Stieglitz collection here
column6: so the photography collection has grown from there.  So you can see
column7: there really is a little of everything
column8: and sure to be something you may enjoy and perhaps learn a thing or two from.
